title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7406.2 - Reportable incidents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7406.2 - Reportable incidents

State Regulations
(a) The
following incidents shall be reported to the commission pursuant to the
requirements of this Part: (1)
assaults; (2)
sexual
abuse; (3)
sexual
assaults; (4)
employee
misconduct; (5)
communicable
reportable disease; (6)
contraband; (7)
deaths; (8)
escapes; (9)
escape attempts; (10)
fires; (11)
personnel group actions; (12)
resident group actions; (13)
hostage situations; (14)
major disturbances; (15)
major maintenance/service
disruptions; (16)
natural/civil
emergencies; (17)
attempted
suicides; (18)
self-inflicted
injuries; and
(19)
serious
accidental injuries. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7406.2

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
